# CUTSCENE::SET_CUTSCENE_FADE_VALUES

## Summary
Sets the fade values for the command, WARNING: Using this command will change the behaviour of the skip fades, so only call it of you NEED to override fade values

## Parameters
* **BOOL** fadeOutAtStart = false
* **BOOL** fadeInAtStart = false
* **BOOL** fadeOutAtEnd = false
* **BOOL** fadeInAtEnd = false

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Please note calling this command will affect the behaviour when skipping.
If you call this you will have to make sure that the cutscene fades in at the end for both a skip and non skip, irrespective of any of  the values you have set.
